para.text: Every person performing or exercising a duty, function, or power under this Act must have regard to the following general principles:

para.label: a
para.text: work in paid employment offers the best opportunity for people to achieve social and economic well-being:

para.label: b
para.text: the priority for people of working age should be to find and retain work:

para.label: c
para.text: people for whom work may not currently be an appropriate outcome should be assisted to prepare for work in the future and develop employment-focused skills:

para.label: d
para.text: people for whom work is not appropriate should be supported in accordance with this Act.
